original_text: And the king of Babylon struck them down and put them to death at Riblah in the land of Hamath. So Judah was taken into exile out of its land.
korean_text: 바벨론의 왕이 하맛 땅 립나에서 다 쳐 죽였더라 이와 같이 유다가 사로잡혀 본국에서 떠났더라

sentences.original_text: And the king of Babylon struck them down
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바빌론 왕이 그들을 쳐서 쓰러뜨렸고

sentences.original_text: at Riblah in the land of Hamath.
So Judah was taken into exile out of its land.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 유다는 자기 땅에서 포로로 잡혀갔습니다.
